content: RE: http://www.military.com/features/0,15240,189007,00.html as a ex ecm operator,ecm tech.and decm tech on the B-58,I must say the ECM has gone a long way. RETIRED AF NCO.
reply: RE: http://www.military.com/features/0,15240,189007,00.html as a ex ecm operator,ecm tech.and decm tech on the B-58,I must say the ECM has gone a long way. RETIRED AF NCO.
title: Growler EW Upgrades on The Way

content: They always told us that he who controls the electronic spectrum will control the battlefield -and I have believed it since 1968 when I first flew the CF100 in the EW role! If we do not support this aircraft -any potential enemy will benefit. If we support it -what do we lose? We still have a fully combat ready fighter -and you can never have too many of them! Obviously there are still a few forward-looking and defence-oriented politicians around! God bless them! Jock Williams
